dialogue.text: Well, look at you. Against all odds, you actually did it.
You and your band managed to take the crowd by storm.
I have to admit, you impressed me.
Thank you... It means a lot, coming from you.
Don't get too comfortable. This is just the beginning.
But you’ve got heart, persistence, and the guts to put yourself out there, even when things get tough.
And I think that’s something worth investing in.
I'm offering you a record contract. Your band has earned it.
Good. I expect nothing less than everything you've got.
We're aiming for the biggest stages, the brightest lights.
